466.source:
function formatTextMorph(m) {
    m.emphasizeAll({color: Color.darkGray, fontSize: 12})
    m.emphasizeRegex(/(?:^|\n)#.*/g, {fontSize: 20, color: CrayonColors.ocean})
    m.emphasizeRegex(/(?:^|\n)##.*/g, {fontSize: 16, color: CrayonColors.ocean})

    m.emphasizeRegex(/(?:^|\n)[A-Z]+\:/g, {fontSize: 12, color: Color.black})
    m.emphasizeRegex(/(?:^|\n)\*.*/g, {fontSize: 12, color: Color.red.darker(1)})

    m.emphasizeRegex(/(?:^|\n)\%.*/g, {fontSize: 10, color: Color.green.darker(2)})

}

659.source:
function reset() {
    this.doNotSerialize = ['partsVersions', 'cachedParts']

    this.partsVersions = null
    this.cachedParts = null
    this.get("PartSpaces").setList([])
    this.get("Parts").setList([])
    this.get("Summary").textString = ""

}
